targets.query: SELECT mean("bitrate") FROM "stream" WHERE "id" =~ /^$Name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cc")  *800 FROM "stream" WHERE "id" =~ /^$Name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cc") *80 FROM "stream" WHERE "id" <> 'select tag value' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("bitrate")  FROM "stream" WHERE "id" <> 'select tag value' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("bitrate"), mean("cc") *800 FROM "stream" WHERE "id" = 'Первый' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "stream" WITH KEY = "id"
